hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by al-Hajjaj ibn Abdullah al-Nasri: The spoils are a right; the Prophet ﷺ gave spoils (to the fighters)

narrators.name: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ
narrators.full_name: Muhammad ibn Abdullah ibn Abd al-Muttalib ibn Hashim

potential_issues.issue: Weak narrator in chain: Abdar-Rahman ibn Jabir is classified as unknown/weak
potential_issues.impact: Presence of weak narrator significantly affects hadith reliability, requires corroborating evidence

potential_issues.issue: Indirect transmission term (عَنْ) used with weak narrator
potential_issues.impact: Adds ambiguity about direct hearing, typical pattern for weak narrations

hadiths.english_translation: Complete analysis required for this narration
